title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 340.4 - Time and place for inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 340.4 - Time and place for inspection

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records shall be accepted
and records made available for inspection and copying between the hours of 8:30
a.m. and 5 p.m., on business days, at 40 North Pearl Street, Albany, NY, or at
such other place as is mutually agreeable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
340.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
